nodes.name: Struggle to relax
nodes.description: If you find it hard to quieten your mind, and reconnect with your body

nodes.name: Signs of stress
nodes.description: Tension headaches, Mild Muscle Tension, Lack of sleep, Fatigue

nodes.name: Burnout Symptoms
nodes.description: Chronic Pain and Fatigue, High Stress Levels, Slow recovery

nodes.name: Lymph swelling / Odema
nodes.description: Fluid build up (joints, legs, arms), Restless legs, Post cancer

nodes.name: Muscle Tension (Mild)
nodes.description: Muscles feel tender, achey and tight

nodes.name: Muscle Tension (severe)
nodes.description: Painful, stiff muscles that won't relax, or are in spasm

nodes.name: Injuries
nodes.description: RSI, Frozen shoulders, Sports, Office jobs, Rheuma, Neck and Shoulder pain

nodes.name: Improves circulation
nodes.description: Stimulates blood circulation, Lowers blood pressure, Eliminates toxins

nodes.name: Mild Acne
nodes.description: Lower grades of Acne, mainly blackheads and conjestion with a few pustules.

nodes.name: Heavy Acne
nodes.description: Medium to heavy grades of Acne, Blackheads with many pustules, and/or small cysts

nodes.name: Stress
nodes.description: Red, irritated flare ups, mild breakouts, dehydration and changes in texture/oil balance

nodes.name: Minimal Skin Issues
nodes.description: No real skin compaints, focus is on skin nourishment and relaxation.

nodes.name: Fine Lines
nodes.description: If you stretch a line between 2 fingers and the skin becomes flat again, it will be a fine line caused by dehydration or early signs of aging.

nodes.name: Skin Condaitions
nodes.description: Rosacea, Dermatitis, Eczema, Psoriasis, and other sensitive skin conditions

nodes.name: Eczema
nodes.description: Skin disorder that prevents the function of skins natural barrier and oil balance causing dry, itchy, red skin

nodes.name: Psoriasis
nodes.description: Auto-immune disorder that usualy presents in patches of round, itchy plaques, and causes skin to shed too fast.

nodes.name: Rosasea
nodes.description: Skin disorder that causes painful, itchy spots similar to acne. Cheeks, nose and chin are generally very red and hot.

nodes.name: Dermatitis
nodes.description: Rashes and skin irritation catorgorised in different types (Eczema is a type of dermatitis). Each type has its own treatment method.

nodes.name: Scarring
nodes.description: Scare tissue formed by Acne or injury to the skin.

nodes.name: Swedish massage
nodes.description: Traditional Relaxation Massage with soft, flowing techniques

nodes.name: Trigger point
nodes.description: Pressure is applied to specific spots from where the muscle has created a knot. Great for pain refereal and stubborn muscle tension

nodes.name: Ayurvedic Techniques
nodes.description: This involves gentle techniques, working to rebalance Sharkras

nodes.name: Deep tissue
nodes.description: Strong pressure is applied to deeper lying muscles  to relieve pain and increase mobility

nodes.name: Myofascial release
nodes.description: Involves strong rolling movements to create space between skin, muscles and connective tissue to allow tensed muscles to release.

decision.name: Acne Face
decision.subtitle: Firmer techniques to release tension and pain.
